# usage

**Instance Property**

A set of contexts in which you can use tensors you create with this descriptor.

## Declaration

```swift
var usage: MTLTensorUsage { get set }
```

## Discussion

The default value for this property is a bitwise `OR` of:

- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLTensorUsage/render]
- [doc://com.apple.metal/documentation/Metal/MTLTensorUsage/compute]
title: usage
